block.p: RUBIN-Jerome, September 28, 2000. Husband of the late Ruth. Father of Dr. Harvey (Elizabeth) Rubin and the late Adrienne Davidson. Grandfather of Karen, Elaine, Matthew and Benjamin. Great-grandfather of Erica and Allison. Relatives and friends are invited to funeral services Friday, at 10:30 A.M., at Goldsteins Rosenbergs Raphael-Sacks, 6410 North Broad Street, Philadelphia, Penn. Interment Montefiore Cemetery, Fox Chase, Penn.
